author: abdoulline
body:
No changes expected for eras <= 2017 (cuts kept unchanged)
Some increase of N_towers (and soft part of energy sums) expected for >= 2018 due to lowering of HE RecHit cut (both on depth1 and depths2-7) on CaloTowers constituents.
title: CaloTowers: adding separate HES/HED depth1 cut
